mapper.select: select * from board order by gid desc, seq limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.update: update board set cnt = cnt + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, pname, pw, content, upfile, reg_date, cnt, seq, lev, gid, id) values (#{title},#{pname},#{pw},#{content},#{upfile}, sysdate(),0,0,0, #{id}, #{id})
mapper.delete: delete from board where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update board set upfile = null where id = #{id} and pw= #{pw}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where id = #{id} and pw= #{pw}
